More About Select Sponsors

Stevens Capital Management LP is a quantitative hedge fund manager specializing in the rigorous development and disciplined implementation of empirically based trading strategies. Our flagship fund has been in business for more than 30 years. Our highly productive team works in a fast-paced collegial environment, utilizing extensive data sets, technology and the scientific method to devise and employ trading strategies throughout the worldâ€™s most liquid financial markets. SCM actively seeks candidates for career opportunities in quantitative financial research and C++ development. Alinea is an investing app for GenZs to invest in what matters to them like Clean Energy, Blockchain, or Women-Led companies. On Alinea, you can invest in stacks (bundles of stocks) which allow you to reduce your risk and diversify your investments from the start. Create your own stacks and share with friends! At Yugabyte, we are on a mission to build the default database for cloud-native applications in a multi-cloud world. We are well underway on this journey with YugabyteDB, the open-source, high-performance, distributed SQL database that runs on any cloud and enables developers to get instantly productive using well-known APIs. And the best is yet to come! We are looking for talented and driven people to join us on our ambitious mission and help us build a lasting and impactful company.

If you are interested in supporting all the things we do here at ACM, check out some of our opportunities for organizations to get involved. You can also view sponsorship details for the coming cycle here.
